revised_title: Motion of a Sphere in a Rotating Liquid: Pressure and Fluid Dynamics
tldr: The authors study the motion of a sphere in a rotating liquid and determine the pressure distribution and fluid dynamics around the sphere. They find that the pressure increases rapidly at first and then oscillates with diminishing amplitude, eventually reaching a constant value. The motion of the fluid around the sphere is similar to that of a spherical source generated on the axis of a rotating liquid.
